Data source.?institute: CSR, JPL, GFZ; required if mode is presets
Data source.?release: RL06, RL061, RL062; required if mode is presets
Data source.?lmax: int; required if mode is presets
Data source.?local path: relative path; required if mode is local path

Dates.?begin date: yyyy-mm(-dd), specifying day does not have an impact in general, as GRACE TVG products are usually given with time resolution of a month.
Dates.?end date: yyyy-mm(-dd), specifying day does not have an impact in general, as GRACE TVG products are usually given with time resolution of a month.

basin.?preset basin: name of basin that is preset
basin.?local path: relative path of a basin kernel given in format of SHC, or shpfile; required if mode is presets

de-correlation.?method: PnMm, window_stable, window_Wahr2006, window_Duan2009 or none
de-correlation.?PnMm params: [fitting order: int, starting order: int]; required if method is PnMm
de-correlation.?window stable params: [fitting order: int, starting order: int, minimum window length: int]; required if method is window_stable
de-correlation.?window Wahr2006 params: [fitting order: int, starting order: int, minimum window length: int, A: int, K: int]; required if method is window_Wahr2006
de-correlation.?window Duan2009 params: [fitting order: int, starting order: int, minimum window length: int, A: int, K: int,p: int, gamma: int]; required if method is window_Duan2009

average filter.?method: Gaussian, fan, non_isotropic_Gaussian (by Han et al., 2005), DDK or none

leakage correction.?method: iterative, additive, multiplicative, scaling, gridded scaling, data-driven, forward modeling, buffer or none

pre-average filter.?method: Gaussian, fan, non_isotropic_Gaussian (by Han et al., 2005), DDK or none

GIA correction.?with filtering: if true, GIA model will suffer the same average filter and leakage correction with GRACE data.

GAX recovery.?with filtering: if true, GAX model will suffer the same average filter and leakage correction with GRACE data.
